message.body: we wouldn't charge any fees to screen ES right? weird to even be asked that
No fee. Maybe if they wanted us to come out and talk we could charge a speaking g fee
is that normal? wouldn't want to be the only one with a fee
Oh yeah it's normal. Ben, Fiona both do it
how much? or I could say if the festival had any funds to help us travel there that would be great. and ben is a super star with a feature!
well I'll just say the travel thing then
